description: The file is an HTML document for a web frontend of a database visualizer application, including embedded CSS and JavaScript code for dynamic interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders HTML table from JSON data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
